Good story lines, good acting, entertaining, great character.  The writers kept your interest, and stayed true to the storylines submitted.
Great gift for my wife. She loves this show. Great show great cast. Enjoy the interaction between the characters. T V needs more character driven dramas. Love the visuals on this show.

Looks new but. So for I have watched season 1 and the case is broken and the cds don't stay in place, both cases are that way. The CDs paused a few time while watching. I hoping the rest are in better shape.

Season 1: Review: Bones is a really good show. I thought I would of not liked it but I was wrong I love all the different ways that they find bodies and how they solve them plus all the personal stories behind the victims. the actors in this show are really good I love david boreanaz. and Emily deschannel is perfect as bones. they have a really good chemistry. the show is great the actors are great the stories are great. everything about this show is awesome. but I will have to say that temprence does get a little annoying once in a while. here are the best episodes of season 1. hart hanson has created a great show.

Im a huge fan of this show, so when i was able to get all of these seasons foa a decent price, i was so excited. Love em. Awesome value.

This is the ULTIMATE in the must have Bones collection. I have tortured my wife with watching all 9 seasons in a row during a period of time I was off work. I will be anxiously awaiting further seasons. What is not to like about this show? 3 very Sexy ladies star in it, and one bad ass FBI agent protects them all.

I have had many problems with skipping. I have watched season one and had a lot of skipping and the first disc of season two, it skipped once or twice on that disc.

We love the program, but we were very unhappy with these DVDs. The box for season 1 had 2 copies of discs 3 & 4, and no discs1 & 2! Also, although they were sold as new, I believe they had been used and repackaged. There were many scratches and skips. I tried to save some money by buying these from one of the other suppliers, not Amazon directly, and I learned my lesson.
I had a minor problem with my dvd player playing the discs, but after contacting the seller I was extremely pleased with the final results.  I would recommend this seller to any one!!
Love it, wished I had started watching from the beginning when it first appeared.  The storylines are grea  Good watchingt
